title: Родные люди
overview: Sisters Olga and Anna get acquainted with a handsome man Sasha and fall in love with him both. But life is too complicated and Olga has to turn him down to Anna. However, when they got married Sasha cannot forget Olga and it turns out that Olga is pregnant. And Sasha choose the calm life with Anna. But when he finds out that Anna is barren, he asks Olga to give their baby to them, which results in the sisters becoming foes.This is a story about strangers who can be close to you and relatives who can hate each other. This is a love story. It shows us what we can do for love and how much it costs.
